title: Fried fish with garlic and spring onions
description: Strips of battered fish, shallow fried and served with a hot sauce. Perfect for eating with Singapore noodles.
ingredients: 450g/1lb fillets of sole or plaice (dark skin removed), cut into 2.5cm/1in strips
¼ tsp freshly ground white pepper
2 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
